Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very impressed with the cuisine. As a lover of Indian food who tries it at restaurants all over the planet, Iâ€™m not easy on them and this one was good.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: So many choices of restaurants in this neighborhood. Would recommend  Memories for Indian food. I can tell a good Indian just by the Pompodom and relishes which vary between spicy and aromatic . â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Great Indian dining experience!! My boyfriend and I went with the social deal offer and had an amazing three course menu for a super fair price. All dishes came with an amazing set of sauces/ dips and their rice pudding desert is to die â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We had dinner at Memories of India on a quiet Wednesday night early in the evening due to the new lockdown hours. The restaurant plays pleasant traditional music and the owner and his team are just wonderful. The food; we are vegetarian; â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Please be alert: 1) you order two drinks: ginger tea and Spa with bubbles. You have to pay for the Spa 6 euro. The waiter let you pay for the whole bottle of 1 liter. (Never asked for 1 liter Spa). 2) one menu with rice incl. and one menu â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Mediocre indian restaurant with decent food. Let's start it off with one thing that annoys me about restaurants. In the bathroom there was no hot water. That shows me just how cheap a place is. Now let's go to the food. I ordered saag â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Great ambience, typical of a north Indian restaurant. Nice slow bollywood retro music playing in the background was a delightful experience. Tomato, fish soup were good, mulligatawny soup was average. Indian dips and papad were yummy. Main â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I'm fond of spicy food and they used to make their curries really hot. This is not really happening anymore, which is sad. I always ask for extra spicy vindaloo as a standing order, recently I could eat it all without any issues. That's not what I'm looking for. Not too authentic according to an Indian colleague.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I spotted the extensive amounts of TripAdvisor certificates in the window so decided to pop in and give them a try. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good Indian Restaurant nearby Rembrandtplein. Delicious served food and good service. Nice tables and decoration. I can recommend the pistachio ice for desert.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very good food we enjoyed a lot . One of the best restaurant in Amsterdam. Highly recommend. The service was excipients and the owner was very friendly. We had a fantastic evening.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Top class Indian food and respect your allergies especially gluten free definitely my choice for Indian classy cuisine in Amsterdam 5*

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: This is our favorite Indian restaurant in Amsterdam! Food is always delicious, staff is super friendly and fair price. Reservation is almost never needed, but some days are very crowded. So you can call before, just to be safe. Make sure to try their Naan with mango chutney and Chicken Tikka Masala.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
I had ordered Amritsari Chole and rice for the first time. You can see, why I disliked it. Don't know if it was oily that day only or is a regular thing.
Might want to try but explicitly ask for no oil !!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We don't have much experience with Indian food, staff was friendly with helping us choose food that wouldn't be too spicy for us. We had the onion bhaji as starter, 3 different kinds of naan, and 3 different kinds of curry that we were all happy with.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very nice restaurant,food is really good here.I've been here many times and definitely will be coming back.The desserts are nice as well,you can get here Indian beer ,wine and cocktails.There is a good selection.I recommend this place :)

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: One of my favorite restaurants in Amsterdam very nice Indian food, friendly staff, highly recommend and I recommend batter chicken

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very nice food we had - Dinesh sharma s romantic song with with his delicious food was very nice , had a very good time in the restaurant, as the name states we got back memories of India back . Dal makani and chicken baltik with garlic roti was so delicious. Whoever comes to Netherland must visit this restaurant.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very tasty authentic Indian food! Especially the paneer makhani. Service was incredible and friendly. I would definitely come again.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Incredible good Indian food with excellent service.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We went there on Saturday evening, was sitting on the Terrace,  the gentle man received us with a smile and warm welcome, one guy in service was managing the complete terrace with loads of personal attention to both the tables, had â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good food for vegetarians like me and very close to hotel. Descent taste and very good and quick service.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Excellent! Really good and authentic Indian food. Comparable with local Hyderabad Biryani.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Great service and food. The curries are generous and delicious, excellent peshwari naan, samosas and lassie. We'll definitely go back:-)

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very tasty food, but mister Sharma needs to be a little less stressed out.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Delicious authentic North Indian food. Very friendly service, I would defiantly go again given the opportunity.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Loved the food! Just be aware: if you order it spicy, you'll get more than what most westerners bargain for. Which is a fun sight to behold; even the chef took a quick look, I think. We survived. Great food, will definitely come back!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: My friends and I visited this restaurant the day we arrived in Amsterdam in August. We are from Glasgow, Scotland which is famous for its fantastic Indian restaurants and curries so our go-to restaurants are usually of the sort. This â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Food is really good and very tasty and prices are also very reasonable. It is also really good with proper Indian ambiance and Indian hospitality. I would definitely suggest this restaurant for your special dayðŸ™‚

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Bad experience. The staff owners are pushy to get the plates, and upsell their items while thereâ€™s no other customer when we walk in at 5pm. They are very quick at collecting plates. Their Aloo Gobi tastes inauthentic, potatoes are not â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I had a really nice meal here with a group of British colleagues who were keen to have some Indian food. They were not disappointed. The place got really busy as we were eating and as a result the staff seemed a bit overwhelmed and the drinks service was a bit haphazard, but the food was excellent.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We tried chicken baryani and tasted delicious but food took longer to get it .

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Definitely this is a place of memories but not of India rather 'bad memories' .. if you want to spoil your Amsterdam trip, this is the place to go to.. We went yesterday for dinner and thanks to the lovely waiter there, we will never step â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The best indian food experience i've had so far hands down. From starter to dessert, everything waw perfect. The spices in the dishes are mesmerizing good. I chose the Chicken Balti and recommene it gladly.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Best Indian  Restaurant in Amsterdamm

for me this was the best  Butter chicken, Nan was really good, friendly service still the best indian restaurant

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: One of the best Indian restaurant in Amsterdam. The place has a good variety of Indian food and you will not be disappointed with the taste if you are from North India. Very decent interiors, owner and staff are very friendly. Sip a drink and order the best of Indian food and enjoy it while you are in Amsterdam.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Went there to have a nice Indian Dinner...but the staff is soo sooo soooo rude and unfriendly....
Worst experience....

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Such a great restaurant with amazing food and service! Where we sat originally was rather cold (for us) so with no hesitation we were moved to another table. Server was funny, helpful and polite! Food was to die for and would recommend for anyone in the area! Would definitely return !

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: No professional ethics. I was visiting Amsterdam and went to this place on my birthday. I had no prior reservation and they declined me a table. I just waited for two moments and a couple showed up and clearly stated that they had no prior â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Friendly, attentive service. Large choice of dishes and fair prices.  Food was hot,  spicy and full of flavour. Decor and ambience was nice too. Only minor complaint everything extra - popadoms , onion chutney was charged - in the UK this would be free with a Â£150 meal.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Ignorant staff.
My girlfriend was completely ignored by some of the wait staff. They directed all questions to me and wouldn't accept any answers from her. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The food was okay and ambience was fine but we were greatly disappointed with the service. The manager was really rude and arrogant. He forced us to take bigger meals however as we were not much hungry ,so wanted to have smaller ones which â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Itâ€™s an amazing restaurant, I have been in three different Indian restaurant in Amsterdam, but Memories of India was the best of all of them â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Amazing food this reminded me of proper Indian food from the restaurants of India. Food was spicy because we asked to make it spicy as per our Indian pallete. The ambience is good as well, if I was living in Amsterdam I would definitely come here often. The owner spoke really felt as if we were eating in India.

Name: Memories of India

Review Text: I had a very bad experience visiting this restaurant. The owner / manager was not courteous enough to allow customers to enter the Restaurant and even though there were enough empty seats available, we were asked to come later.  This shows â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: he didnâ€™t say i love you back

Review Text: So, I ordered biryani they gave rice mixed with Paneer mutter gravy them mixed both to make it look like biryani. Name: Memories of India
Review Text: My husband and I stumbled upon this place and it turned out to be one of the most memorable parts of our trip. The food was absolutely amazing and it felt so authentic in its atmosphere. The staff were so kind and even gave us samples of their house Indian wine. I hope one day to go back.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very nice ambience, pleasant staff, and delicious food - everything we had was very well spiced with great depth of flavour. Lots of good vegetarian options, and they were easily able to accommodate our request for gluten free food.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The only time we felt bad in Amsterdam was after having food from this restaurant. We were looking for something very light and ordered one egg fried rice and veg fried rice which costed around 11 Euros. The owner behaved restless and â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Fantastic authentic Indian food and good sized portions

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Charged â‚¬6 for water. They said it's against the policy to serve tap water. "We are in central Amsterdam so we need to cover the cost".
Food was ok ok.. Nothing special. Wouldn't recommend it. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The staff in this restaurant is not very welcoming for Indian/Asian ethnicity. I found this place through Google recommendation and made a reservation in advance. When I walked into the restaurant the staff at the door was about to deny the â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The best Indian cuisine experience I have had so far. Great food, very friendly staff, and for a reasonable price. Absolutely superb, I will certainly visit next time I find myself in Amsterdam ;)

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Again I had a chance to dine in this restaurant during my business trip to Amsterdam. The food this time was definitely upgraded in all respects.  The service was also very fast and attentive.  In all it was again a pleasure to be here and enjoy indian cuisine. I would highly recommend.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I've visited Memories of India many times and this restaurant never lets me down. Food is always of excellent quality and very reasonably priced. Relaxed atmosphere...the right place to go after a day of wandering the streets of the hectic city centre.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Food is good right near the Rembrandt square they have halal food.
We took the vegetables semosa(very good), prawns poori(good), chicken korma (too much coconut), shrimps biryani (not impressed, i expected this dish to be the â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The place is really worth to try. I had the lamb tikka massala and it was quite tasty. It might be spicy so better ask to make it not spicy if you cannot handle. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: VERY Poor quality curries, at high prices. It seems the tactic of this restaurant is to not worry about the flavour and instead make the curries more spicy. Easily the worst prawn puri I have ever had. And I am not a fussy person. It is â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very goed meals! Friendly People, good food. Will come again.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: In the heart of centre of Amsterdam we found this Indian Restaurant superb. Nice menu, decore,  food and service. We give it five bubbles.Highly recommended

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We discovered this restaurant while walking on the streets of Amsterdam. Outside appearance is normal but after entering inside we got saw impressive decor.  After having dinner we came to the conclusion that this was our best meal in an Indian restaurant so far. Service was very friendly and the food was superb.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Well the green chicken curry is too sour. Also the absence of vegetables in the curry indicates little effort is placed on good ingredients. Sauce is also not thick enogh. Also a quality indicator. With so many cheaper and better options around better save the ~15 Euros for a curry and find another good restaurant in town.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: wow, i did not expect that. i just had the most tender lamb i've ever had. the flavour was great, the spice level spot on and even the bare rice was tasty. what id like to highlight is that the interior is not this over-the-top indian bollywood style. i prefer it like this a lot more. i so will come again!!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Went here on business dinner with a team of 16 people from work, food was fantastic especially the lamb, the atmosphere was chilled and service was quick and polite .. been here 3 or 4 times and each time the same experience. Great stuff !!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Memories of India with NO ETHICS OF INDIA.
The staff /owner has no courtesy to talk to the customers and was in fact very rude and arrogant. The reason is we were a group of 3 and ordered 2 drinks and a â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I visit Amsterdam regularly and most of the times, I am at memories of India for my dinner. This place is very easy to reach from amAmsterd central, just get into tram 4 and get down at Rembrandt sauare. Excellent place for Indian food. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Fantastic kitchen. Happen to be staying nearby and my buyer offered me a dinner here in this restaurant.  Very finely spiced food with a good presentation and friendly service.  All the dishes were perfect.  Would return for sure.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Had dinner last night with 2 more friends and enjoyed every second of it.
Staff were kind and pleasant and the food was absolutely gorgeous! An absolute treat!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Fairly nice restaurant in the amsterdam to pacify the taste buds of Indians origin, atmosphere is pretty appealing, prices are bit higher and lots of options for Indian cousine. Lots of customers visits on weekends, especially Indians. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We popped into this restaurant on a snowy evening and minus temperatures outside. Atmosphere is great inside. Nice and warm temperature with dimmed lights. The interior of the restaurant is not usual of a traditional indian restaurant but â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The experience was dreadful. We came in on a rainy tuesday night, ready to eat Indian. The housr was half-full But we couldn't get a table. All of the Staff turned a blind eye And wouldn't serve us. It seemed they didn't want us there at â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Great Indian, one of the best in town. Their Samosa's are to die for, and their lamb vindaloo is worth coming back for. You even get the traditional mixed herbs as a mouth freshener at the end of the meal

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Me my family are fond of only Indian food. We were lucky to find one in Amsterdam. Better taste of food even from Delhi. We recommend highly

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Me and my family are fond of only Indian food. We were lucky to find one in Amsterdam. Better taste of food even from Delhi. We recommend highly.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: food was really nice, delicious. Staff is also very friendly. complimentary papad per person, and refreshing hot towels at the end. Really liked. Will definitely visit again.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I m giving this place one star because couldnâ€™t give less than that. The staff in this restaurant  isnâ€™t welcoming at all. Owner is very rude and arrogant, he forced us to order a big meal when we were there only for a small snacks break.. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Really bad service, having to wait long. Biased staff that spoke badly of the dining guests in their local language.
I had a clear view of the kitchen from where I was sitting and the kitchen hygiene is bad. The chefs did not follow hygiene standards.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Did not like the service here. The food was not great either. They have a feeling that they serve great Indian food but the truth is that just making food spicy with 10 levels of hotness does not make it good Indian food.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We were there at 10pm and it was relatively empty. Came in with 2 Dutch and an Indian family. They seated the Dutch couple and Indian family. Told us they have no more seats and they are closed for the night. Maybe because I am Chinese. Terrible. No stars if I could do it.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Worst  food ever I had, chicken was was raw cold food, service was terrible

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Worst Indian food in Amsterdam. Ordered chicken jalfrezi which was apparently a chef speciality. It was completely soaked in oil with uncooked chicken pieces. Definitely not recommended.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good and tasty north Indian food in Amsterdam. Naan is good but paneer sabji is four star. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The food was super sweet in a bad way, we have ordered lamb korma and butter chicken both of them were very very sweet, After I tasted it I asked them to make it milder, the staff was nice, they tried to fix it but it became more spicy.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: If you know Indian food, don't eat here. Reheated food That tastes like spiced butter and bad service. When you tell them the foods not heated properly they deny it and accuse you of not knowing what "hot food" tastes like.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Great Service! Great Food! Great Time!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Fantastic curry, heat of the Madras just right, off Rembrandt Square so convenient from the hotels. Service exceptional, gets very busy later, best time is 6pm, before the rush.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Absolutely awful. Myself and my 2 friends went here for dinner and the food was nasty. We didn't eat most of it, and it wasn't exactly cheap! Everything tasted "off", and it didn't get better by dessert. â€¦

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Staff where very friendly and accommodating especially  with it being New year's eve  and we did  not have  a reservation and the food was amazing!! Nicest Indian food I have ever had!!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Incredible food and service. Helpful and kind staff. Beautiful inside the restaurant, and I truly got a good vibe. Recommend to all<3

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Best Indian food Iâ€™ve tried in Amsterdam, and lovely service! Will definitely be back

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We tried this restaurant a couple of times during our recent visit to Amsterdam. It happened to be the best amongst all Indian restaurants.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good Food, Excellent Service.... Visited on Sunday 16th August, Enjoyed the Thali & good man for Service...help us a lot...

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: This time the food was okay, they've done better in the past. Shrimps weren't fresh and rubbery. Palak paneer was good ,so was the Dahl makhni.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: This restaurant was a big dissapointment for us. Chicken was very dry. The prices are not very good if you take a look at the size of the dishes. We would not recommend this place. Other very positive reviews are a big suprise to us.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: The food is good and the price is standard with respected to Amsterdam central. I like the location, but the quantity could have been a little more.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We were originally going to try out the Koh-I-Noor on Rokin but instead we found this place a little closer to the hotel. It was very cosy inside, the food was very nice and the beer went down well. Plus it's in a great little location. I would definitely recommend it here.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: One of the most authentic Indian restaurants outside India. Better than the Dishooms of London. Had spinach chicken and it was awesome.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Delicious food and friendly staff

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I believe this is one of the best Indian food restaurants in Amsterdam. Service is fast, food is delicious and atmosphere is lovely and relaxing.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Too good service and taste and unique experience of personal service.must try if u are looking for authentic Indian taste and nice music too.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Indian food was freshly cooked. The Tika Masala was outstanding. The setting was very traditional. Highly recommended.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good food. Service was extremely nice and polite. Very well priced for the area.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Nothing special! Overpriced for the quality of food and especially the staff attitude! They could and have to be much more polite!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Mediocre taste at best. Overpriced for the quality.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Good food, if you are craving for something Indian. Slightly overpriced, probably because of the location.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:

mixed veg was potato curry in tomato sauce, very oily other veggies.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Best place to have Indian Dinner, specially the owner Mr. Dinesh Sharma is very co operative and he is also an amazing singer.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Amazing butter chicken.ive had a very pleasant experience in this restaurant.Owner and staff are very welcoming and corcerned for customer satisfactory.Id come here again if i visit Amsterdam.Altho the wait time for my food was abit long it was well worth the wait.Keep up the good work guys

Name: Memories of India
Review Text:
Super
There was IBC in Amsterdam and we had a group dinner here. Fantastic and authentic food here. Do not miss.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very mediocre food. As far as Indian restaurants go, this place doesn't register well. The portions are not appropriate for that price too.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Lovely meal, strong flavors. Very attentive and friendly staff. Worth multiple visits!

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good menu, great taste, nice atmosphere... but 4 stars because of the consistently slow service.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: One of the Finest Dining Restaurant in Amsterdam with utmost care taken in hospitality and Indian Cuisine. Highly recommended

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good indian restaurant. Good food. If you love chilly food, try vrindalu curry. My friends from Japan and Europe love the food.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Very oily food and definitely not close to authentic. Service was fine.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Staff was rude, not at all courteous. Please improve the services and behaviour towards customers even if you have to increase the rates. Two stars only for the food.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Good Food & Excellent Service, good person who help us...Sunday we come

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Fantastic food, prices maybe a little higher than usual, but it was worth it. Nice interior.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: We ate like kings at this indian restaurant and can't wait to return.  The curries were delicious!

Review Text: Best curry ever ! ... if you book online you get 30% off your bill.

Review Text: Absolutely brilliant best curry ive ever had n ime from Bradford curry central uk ! Service excellent food excellent very nice restaurant top quality 5 star place highly recommended please visit if u like curry !

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: I like this place, nice food. Introduced some of my non Indian colleagues to this place and they also like it.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Food was okay but expensive and service is not good. I have been here twice and I will not go there again.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Food and also the appearance is good compared to other  Indian restaurants in the area. Worth to give a try when you are in a Indian food mode.

Name: Memories of India
Review Text: Had dinner today, the taste was absolutely amazing. Very good papar and mango lassi as well.
